segments.text: I notice the kitchen's bright with daylight from that window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's in her apron, polishing that plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€”water's gushing out uncontrollably!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the floor, and she's standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so calm, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool, he's reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back, this is bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, grinning I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is eager, palm up for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, breaking the rules behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, could make anyone slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's serene, plants neatly lined up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom; she'll be upset when she sees this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mix of innocence and impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
